sentences.en: He falls asleep as soon as his head hits the pillow.
He fell asleep as soon as he touched the pillow.
sentences.cn: 他脑袋一碰枕头就睡着了.

sentences.en: He laid down his head upon his pillow to rest.
sentences.cn: 他把头枕在枕头上休息.

sentences.en: He pummelled the pillow with his fists.
sentences.cn: 他用双拳不停地捶打枕头。

sentences.en: He smothered the baby with a pillow.
sentences.cn: 他用枕头把婴儿闷死了。

sentences.en: He tried to muffle the alarm clock by putting it under his pillow.
sentences.cn: 他把闹钟塞在枕头底下，想减低声音。

sentences.en: Her strength was exhausted and she fell back on the pillow.
sentences.cn: 她筋疲力尽,又躺在枕头上.

sentences.en: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.cn: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

sentences.en: Sam snuggled down in his pillow and fell asleep.
sentences.cn: 萨姆舒服地枕着枕头进入了梦乡。

sentences.en: She nuzzled her face into her pillow.
She was found asleep on a pillow of leaves.
sentences.cn: 有人看见她枕着树叶睡着了.

sentences.en: Tendrils of hair strayed to the edge of her pillow.
sentences.cn: 她的几缕头发散落在枕边。

sentences.en: The baby suffocated under its pillow.
The killer smothered the victim with a pillow.
sentences.cn: 杀人犯用枕头闷死了受害者.

sentences.en: The pillow cover can match up with the sheets.
sentences.cn: 这条枕巾可以和床单配上。

phrases.tran_cn: 开口式枕套；无边式枕套
（小孩在临睡前在卧室内用枕头）打闹；小争吵

trans.tran_en: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping
